text: Kuma sifar waɗanda suke ciyar da dũkiyarsu dõmin nẽman yardõjin Allah, kuma da tabbatarwa daga kansu, kamar misãlin lambu ne a jigãwa wadda wãbilin hadari ya sãmu, sai ta bãyar da amfãninta ninki biyu To, idan wãbili bai sãme ta ba, sai yayyafi (ya ishe ta). Kuma Allah ga abin da kuke aikatawa Mai gani ne.
